function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential lack of causal evidence for relationship between mental health and healthcare expenditure","Impact":"Uncertain policy and research priorities, potential misallocation of funds","Mitigation":"Conduct further intervention research within a European setting to provide causal evidence","Technologies":"Intervention research methodologies, data analysis techniques","People":"Policy makers, healthcare system administrators","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Hypothetical scenario of moving population to a flourishing state","Impact":"Misallocation of financial resources, potential disinvestment in healthcare system","Mitigation":"Gather empirical data and conduct in-depth analysis before considering large-scale population movements","Technologies":"Data analytics, economic modeling","People":"Danish government, population segment","Owner":"Economic research institutions, government agencies"}]}
